comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Not tested in any great detail, but does work.

Paul R. (wil at chelsea-fc dot com) reports this printer to work with HP's HPLIP driver.

Probably works with various color deskjet drivers including the "cdjXXX" ones and "pcl3"/"hpdj".

Models Cse and Cxi are probably the same, with different bundled software.

Consumables/Refills: cartridge
